=== Ohio Loco Communication Team ===

'''About:''' Team members will need to ensure information is shared on all fronts: the web, the forum, the wiki, and the mailing list. This includes meeting logs, meeting notifications, and anything relevant to the Ohio team. This could also include discussions to keep the mailing list and Ohio team forum active. :)

'''Leader:''' John (<nowiki>[[Tnseditor]]</nowiki>)

See <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~oh-communications|other members]]</nowiki> of the Communication Team.
